title: Anyone Remember This?
body:
http://tecnoslave.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/Feral_Flare.png

I think they gave it a new name this season.

I like to imagine Veigar as the grieving widow.
I find your lack of Garen, disturbing.

http://i.imgur.com/2miSqpc.jpg

_All I know is that to me
You look like you're lots of fun
Open up your lovin' arms
Watch out, here I come_

_You spin me right round, baby
Right round like a record, baby
Right round round round_
GOLD. PURE GOLD.
Gragas is too skinny.
He stopped getting fed after its removal.
Teemo over Syndra? You SICKEN me.
Well, I _am_ evil, you know.

{{champion:55}} Hey Lux, can I talk to you for a minute?

{{champion:99}} What do _you_ want?

{{champion:55}} Well, it's about Garen.  Ever since Deathfire Grasp was destroyed, he hasn't been the same again.  He isn't anywhere near as patriotic as he used to be.  I dunno, could you go talk to him, maybe give him something to cheer him up?

{{champion:99}} Fine.  I suppose you're right.

****

{{champion:99}} Hey big brother, Kat and I got together and got you something... {{item:3135}} 

{{item:3070}} {{champion:86}} NO!  IT'S NOT THE SAME!  I'LL NEVER BE A WIZARD AGAIN!!1!

{{champion:86}} THE GRIEF IS UNBEARABLE!

{{champion:86}} ...

{{champion:86}} I SHALL FIND THE SCUM THAT TOOK MY POWERS FROM ME AND RAIN DOWN DEMACIAN JUSTICE ON THEIR VILLAINOUS HEADS FOR ALL ETERNITY!!!

*Later*

{{champion:99}} Garen... You seem to be in a better mood, how are you?

{{champion:86}} I am wreaking vengeance upon the evil doers of the world who took my wonderful DFG from me.

*An enemy has been slain* {{champion:86}} @=={::::::::> {{champion:55}} 

{{champion:99}} OH MY GOSH WHAT ARE YOU DOING TO KATARINA?!?

{{champion:86}} The voices in my head told me she was a villain who deserved punishment, so I have called upon the authority of all things DEMACIAN! to rain down judgement.

{{champion:55}} *glares at Lux*

{{champion:99}} Hehe... he... yeah...

{{champion:55}} ...

{{champion:99}} He got his patriotism back?

{{champion:86}} **DEMACIAAAAAAAAAA**

*An enemy has been slain* {{champion:86}} @=={::::::::> {{champion:99}}

yo wut the fuck are

the bottom right two, top left, and the two rocks in the middle

the oldest item there i remember is zhonyas ring or old malady...
I'm wondering the same thing, the blue rock I think was some sort of instant teleport to base thing, no clue about the yellow potion and rock next to the blue one.
The "blue rock" is actually Blue Pill (in reference to The Matrix), and has the exact same effect as Recall. People bought it so often they eventually made it an innate skill.
Oh neat, I was right. So there was a red pill I'm guessing? What did that do?

I don't believe there ever was a Red Pill. Lots of early items were ripped from DoTA in some capacity, so Blue Pill was used as a Teleport Scroll equivalent until its removal. The other items appear to be items from Alpha/Beta, BTW.
Aw well that's kind of disappointing.

One of those is blue pill.

It was a purchasable recall because recall used to not exist.

People beg for answers to questions. I queried:
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Removed_items

Each one of these items removed from the game had some major impact. FoN for instance, created the League of Assassins with it's disappearance. What a cruel world.

I remember Eleisa's Blessing: Gave you 20% extra on your Heal and Clarity Summoner Spells.

Also I used to take Emblem of Valor and Mana Manipulator on Thresh for free sustain both mana and health.

Heart of gold was literally the most standard item for any support or tank, and FoN made mundo a beast
Force of Nature DDD: No singed build will ever be the same without it. Rest in peace, you were too good for this world.
Oh god. The memories... they're coming back. The screams.... THE SCREAMS! STOP SCREAMING AT ME!

> [{quoted}](name=Doctor Dyment,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YQ6lsILb,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-09-07T04:45:36.041+0000)
>
> Oh god. The memories... they're coming back. The screams.... THE SCREAMS! STOP SCREAMING AT ME!

damn dude, i started playing only  last month. was this item truly evil?

An Infinitely scaling on hit effect plus heal. The jungle back then was much easier to clear at that time as well. Basically, instead of our standard 15-20 minutes until you see devourer in action, this item was already being used by 10 minutes in. 
{{champion:77}} {{champion:19}} were monsters.

> [{quoted}](name=Catastrop,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YQ6lsILb,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-09-07T12:32:07.421+0000)
>
> An Infinitely scaling on hit effect plus heal. The jungle back then was much easier to clear at that time as well. Basically, instead of our standard 15-20 minutes until you see devourer in action, this item was already being used by 10 minutes in. 
> {{champion:77}} {{champion:19}} were monsters.

You mean more so than they are now?
What part of "on hit heal" do you not get? It was even worse than Devourer just for that fact because it meant not only were they outputting huge damage but they were healing through your damage too.

You will never remember the jungle anyone could clear. 

RIP.
Pre-RW Soraka could clear the S5 Jg. I tried it before the current Jg was migrated. I also Jg Teemo and Ashe still.

4.20 Weedwick will live fondly live on in our hearts and souls.

#neverforget

Feral Flare had an infinitely-scaling on-hit heal attached to it when it was released. Coupled with the jungle being *much* easier to clear at the time, I don't think Devourer compares at all to what the Flare did to the game.

> [{quoted}](name=TemporalDonut,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YQ6lsILb,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-09-07T04:07:32.499+0000)
>
> Feral Flare had an infinitely-scaling on-hit heal attached to it when it was released. Coupled with the jungle being *much* easier to clear at the time, I don't think Devourer compares at all to what the Flare did to the game.

But try sated on yi plus full attack spped build, it wrecks people faster than you can wrech Shia Lebuefs career.
You are right, but Devourer is reminiscent of of Feral Flare, no?
We do not speak of that item here.
I'd rather have sated than that.
RIP
It's kinda sad that items like this are gone.  And It's worse that DFG isn't even in game after Pentakill had such an awesome song about it.

I also remember when Warwick was the best jungler. And Kalista didn't exist. And BoRK didn't make Vayne the most broken thing in the game. And when bot lane mattered. Also, I remember the good, good times when I would build Atma's on Malphite and literally be an unstoppable force.
why did they kill ad malphite...WHY
Sometimes, Loveless... sometimes bad people do bad things. AD Malphite is in a better place now...

[http://static.linnun.net/img/items/64/Wriggle's_Lantern.png](http://static.linnun.net/img/items/64/Wriggle's_Lantern.png)

Ho god miss you so much !!!

The old school Wriggle's lantern Jungle meta was by far the best we EVER had so far in 5 years of LoL.

This Item allowed you to start with {{item:1029}} and 5{{item:2003}} ... so you actually had an item back then. The current {{item:1039}}  **feels like you don't have a real Item from the shop in you inventory when you start jungling.**
Also, Wriggle's lantern had life steal and attack damage on it which was perfect.

The current {{item:3707}} enchant built out of {{item:3134}}  is toxic and exclusive : Too strong very few champions (you know them right ^^ {{champion:64}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:107}} ). Some champions can't build it so they are forced to go for the retarded {{item:3710}} which forces us to farm for years before being effective.... or you have {{item:3709}}  which isn't even interesting unless you just want to be a ball of health and yet die all the same since you don't have damage. 

As a veteran jungler main who started back in season 1, I think enchants like warrior and devourer bring too much imbalance to the game. The old lantern was perfect and fine.... Why can't we just come back to those days  !!!! :(

Now some champions aren't even viable if they don't build {{item:3710}} at some point in every game.  Think about it, {{champion:102}} {{champion:10}} wouldn't even be viable without this imbalanced Item. What's the point of a champion if he revolves entirely around a broken item ?

Fix this game ! Bring back the old lantern ! With real stats, a real starter item and a real utility! 

Thks ^^
I'd rather see league with feral flame instead of sated any day.
Oh look. It's that douche-baggy item that caused a majority of afk junglers.
